channel.title: [PI] When I drink an Overload (1) it then turns into a Saradomin Brew (3) (REP+)
channel.description:
Okay I'm not new at programming or anything but I just don't get why it's doing that. I fixed it from going to an Overload (1) to a Super Attack (4) real fast then turning into a Brew but it still goes into the brew after that. Here's my code in potions.java
[code] case 15335: //Overload (1) doOverload(itemId, 229, slot); //Turns into a Vial after drinking (229)[/code]
So how can I fix this? Why's it doing it? I've tried searching the Brew's Id in my source (6687) but it doesn't come up with any code making it do that. Anyone have an idea?

find where it goes from 4 drinks left 2 3 drinks left and when it cahgnes from 4 to 3 the items are probobly diferent
